name: BT21 BABY BOUCLE LAP BLANKET
overview: This season, our friends are here to wrap you up in some much welcomed warmth. Feeling a little chilly? Throw this blanket over your shoulders or your lap for a quick fix. For an extra touch of coziness to your space, drape it across your bed or sofa. Made with microfiber and boucle fabric for a fluffy soft texture we're all a fan of.
discription: BT21 Baby KOYA boucle lap blanket

name: BT21 Note Paper Set
overview: Built-in compartment pocket for convenient storage of small items.Drawstring design at the mouth of the bag, no need to worry about items falling.Can be used in a variety of ways, such as hand-held, cross-back, and single-shoulder.Soft touch, dreamy colors, add a touch of warm color to autumn and winter.

name: BT21 Blanket
overview: It can be used to put on the shoulders, cover the heels, and feel full of warmth.Can be used as an interior decoration to make the environment more warm and lovely.Soft and comfortable texture, you can't put it down to the touch.Embrace the warmth in your arms and hibernate with the BT21 BABY.
